meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation to encourage a child to stand up or be lifted.
meanings.sent1: Come on, upsadaisy, you can do it!
meanings.sent2: Upsadaisy, let me help you up!
meanings.sent3: Upsadaisy, time to rise and shine!
meanings.sent4: With a little upsadaisy, the child was on their feet.
meanings.sent5: The mother's upsadaisy filled the room with warmth and encouragement.

meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation of surprise or delight.
meanings.sent2: Oh, upsadaisy, I can't believe it!
meanings.sent3: When the cake appeared, upsadaisy echoed through the room.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes widened in upsadaisy at the sight before her.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected gift brought a burst of upsadaisy to her day.
